attributes.action: Publish a ROLL OF HONOUR to those Officers and Soldiers who die in conflict zones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petittion to Honour by way of publishing thier honourable names in the LONDON GAZETTE of those Officers and Soldiers who loose thier lives in any zones of official armed conflict by way of an official ROLL OF HONOUR of those who gave thier lives to Queen and Country.

This petition for publication in the London Gazette is in "addition" to any War or conflict memorial that may be errected now or in the future in honour of those who have fallen.
